root: ^Kieran! I haven't seen you out for some time.
^You've never been this jumpy either, what's wrong.
^It's just... Mayor Kenway's decided to go ahead with the festival this year.
^I didn't realize we were still having it.
^With the way the season's been, nobody expected summer celebrations. We've all been too caught up in our own problems.
^But a couple days ago, the Mayor was pretty adamant on having the festival. And so soon too! Everyone's been scrambling to prepare.
^Huh... I didn't hear about this from anyone.
^Not surprising... no offense! It was all so sudden, you know?
^Dad's put me up as one of this year's speech givers. Mom wrote me a nice little poem.
^But I'm so nervous! I have no time to prepare, no time to practice!
^I know not a lot of people like asking but–!
^Could you please make me something to make me... not scared? A Little confidence boost, kind of!
^Confidence boost...? I don't even know that kind of thing exi–
^Please, Marina! I have the worst stage fright! And it's only this one time!
^Alright, alright! I can... maybe have something prepared.
^task:A Nervous Public Speaker $Kieran $Kieran really doesn't have as much of a problem as she thinks, she's just a little awkward is all. But, it won't hurt to listen and help her out a bit.
